info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 19 at 4:42PM HST until December 20 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR MAUI COUNTY AND THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 AM HST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR HALEAKALA SUMMIT THROUGH 6 AM HST TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR KAUAI AND OAHU THROUGH 6 AM HST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 45 mph with localized gusts over 60 mph, especially over and downwind of terrain. Localized wind gusts over 80 mph possible on the Big Island. * WHERE...Portions of Kahoolawe, Lanai, Maui, Molokai and the Big Island Hawaii. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines and damage roofs. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Strong winds may lead to property damage. Hazardous driving conditions due to powerful cross winds will pose a serious risk for drivers, especially for light weight and high profile vehicles. Loose outdoor items should be brought inside or secured properly.
